definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Li told him there were two ways to resolve the situation, Chen said.
sentences.chinese: 李剛講解決問題有兩條路，陳廣乾說。

sentences.english: The teacher is explaining what we were confused about.
sentences.chinese: 老師正在講解我們原因混淆不清的問題。

sentences.english: They were listening to an expert who is in charge of meteorites at the Smithsonian.
sentences.chinese: 他們在聽專家講解，她是史密斯松寧主管隕石的專家。

sentences.english: The coach is fantastic. He speaks very openly with us and tries to put across his ideas clearly.
sentences.chinese: 教練很牛叉，他對我們的講解非常開放，清晰。

sentences.english: Apart from the lectures there will be eight tutorial sessions at which attendance is required.
sentences.chinese: 除了課堂講解外，另外會有八個必須參加的個別教學。

sentences.english: After a ten-minute break, teachers begin to go over the practice tests that we just finished.
sentences.chinese: 休息十分鐘後老師開始講解剛纔做過的卷子。

sentences.english: They liked to listen to my intruction about the garden and my little plot.
sentences.chinese: 他們樂於聽我講解我們的花園和我的小菜地。

sentences.english: Talk is cheep. But it can save priceless lives.
sentences.chinese: 講解是廉價的，但可以拯救無價的生命。

sentences.english: This section shows you how to create a very simple list report.
sentences.chinese: 本節講解如何創建一個非常簡單的列表報告。

sentences.english: We will point out some of the major differences as we go along.
sentences.chinese: 在講解過程中我們將指出其中的一些主要區別。

sentences.english: Explain the meaning of needling and moxibustion techniques and its important position.
sentences.chinese: 講解刺灸法的含義及其重要地位。

sentences.english: And we're going to talk briefly about testing.
sentences.chinese: 然後也對調試做做講解。

sentences.english: Explain the circulation of Foot -Taiyang, Foot-Shaoyinmeridians.
sentences.chinese: 分析講解足太陽經，足少陰經的經脈循行。

sentences.english: Harout, the host showed the map while analyzing the historical background of Israel and Palestina.
sentences.chinese: 主持人哈魯特用地圖講解了以巴衝突的歷史背景。

sentences.english: I appreciate this oil paining much more now that you have explained it to me.
sentences.chinese: 由於你給我講解了這幅油畫，我會更欣賞它了。

sentences.english: Artists explaining the usage of the different kinds of personal protective equipment.
sentences.chinese: 藝員講解各款個人防護裝備的用處。

definition: to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
